description:
No server required, peer-to-peer chat.

Supports IPv6/IPv4 networks. It can do simple text information transmission, point-to-point direct communication without intermediate server. 
Applicable to local area network, Internet.
Use "Friends List" to distinguish friends from strangers.
Based on the IP Messenger (IPMsg for short) communication protocol.
The software interface supports Chinese and English. Operating environment,Java JRE 1.8 or higher, Windows/Linux operating system.
For customized development, please contact support@zheguisoft.com
Release notes are currently unavailable for this release. Check the ReleaseNotesUrl for more information.
license_or_tos: Proprietary freeware, based on open source components
